title: Field Management
column_name_tooltip: Define the table header, where relevant data can be stored under the corresponding header.
column_description_tooltip: Description of the header field, helping users or AI models understand the table header field
column_type_tooltip: Select the data type corresponding to the stored field
column_required_tooltip_required: Required field: When saving a row of data, the corresponding field information must be provided, otherwise the row cannot be saved
column_required_tooltip_optional: Optional field: When the field information is missing, a row of data can still be saved in the table
modal_delete_content: After deletion, all data under the field will be deleted together and cannot be recovered. Are you sure you want to delete field {name}?
